title: 85.4 (LOA)
content:
As you stop for water, Calypsa pats the scabbard of her machete, as if to reassure herself of its presence.

"We still have some distance to travel to find the last reclaimer," she says. "Are you still up for this hunt?"

A) Continue helping Calypsa look for the reclaimer. Discard all   from Calypsa. Clear Calypsa with   while a Reclaimer Seeker is in the path discard to analyze it.

B) Leave her to her task. Discard Calypsa. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
